comments.body: I suggest you generate a warning and then continue so that it's clear to users that this is intentional.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +322,326 @@            if h['vlan_id'] == '1':
                module.warn("Deletion of vlan 1 is not allowed; purge will ignore vlan 1")
                continue
            obj_in_want = search_obj_in_list(h['vlan_id'], want)
            if not obj_in_want:
